fixes.name: month (data Series)
fixes.dax_expression: "M" & FORMAT(MONTH('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[date series]), "0") & FORMAT(YEAR('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[date series]), "0")
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau string concatenation to DAX using &. Wrapped MONTH() and YEAR() results with FORMAT(..., "0") to convert numbers to strings. Replaced [date series] with 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[date series] per table reference rules.
